GH NVTA for the next few years trading in these will be characterized by periods of slow grind up interrupted by brief mini selloff panics The net of it will be a 10 or more baggers This is typical of companies with a huge TAM that are in investment mode During troubled macro environments people look at their portfolio and dump everything EXCEPT low pe sure things which are never sure things anyway These wont look like a sure thing for many yearsbut the TAM is not going away even if the macro environment is troubled So do the counter intuitive thing and put your head in the sand during those periods
NVTA Low volume stocks are a bad bet
